overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.831em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm \left(\hat{i}\times\hat{j}\right)\times\hat{j} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="width: 6.469em;                                 </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="width: 10.535em; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 4 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো একটি নদীতে একটি দাঁড়ের নৌকার বেগ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>12</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="width: 5.069em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-142"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-143"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="font-size: 70.7%; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>6</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="width: 4.473em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.561em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-154"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-155"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-156" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-157" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>6</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\rm 6\ kmh^{-1}</script></span> হলে নৌকাটি কত কোণে সোজা অপর পাড়ে পৌঁছাবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B1;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>120</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="width: 13.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1010.74em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-183"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-190"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-195"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">α</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">120</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-202"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-203"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>12</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>120</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm cos\alpha=-\frac{6}{12}=-\frac{1}{2}\therefore\alpha=120°</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            <span>Question 5 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোনটি অক্ষীয় ভেক্টর?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>অক্ষীয় ভেক্টর: কৌণিক বেগ, কৌণিক ত্বরণ, কৌণিক ভরবেগ ইত্যাদি।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 6 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুটি বল যথাক্রমে 3N ও 4N হলে এবং পরস্পরের সাথে একই দিকে ক্রিয়াশীল হলে লব্ধি বল কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2.3.4.</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>0</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>49</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mo>.</mo></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="width: 18.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.125em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1015.04em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-206"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭০]</p>
</span>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.324em; left: 0.184em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.458em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.271em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm \vec {P}\times \vec {Q}=PQ</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="width: 5.512em;                                             <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-296" style="width: 5.512em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>লম্ব হলে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-311" style="width: 11.6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1009.47em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-312"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-313"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-314"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-315"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.125em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-320"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-321"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.166em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-328"></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">90</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-331"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-332"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Q</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>90</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm \vec{P} \times \vec{Q}=PQ \sin\ 90°=PQ</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 8 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুটি অসমান ভেক্টরের লব্ধি কখন শূন্য হয়?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>সমকোণে ক্রিয়াশীল হলে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>একই দিকে ক্রিয়াশীল হলে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>বিপরীতে ক্রিয়াশীল হলে</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>কখনো শূন্য হয় না</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>দুটি সমান ও বিপরীতমুখি ভেক্টরের লব্ধি শূন্য হয়। অসমান হলে কখনোই শূন্য হবে না।&nbsp;<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 9 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="width: 8.571em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">30</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>30</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm \vec{A}. \vec{B}=9×4+1×(-6)+(-6)×5=36-6-30 =0 </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                            <p>ত্রিমাত্রিক স্থানাঙ্ক ব্যবস্থায় ধনাত্মক Z অক্ষের দিকে আয়ত একক ভেক্টর কোনটি?</p>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="width: 0.685em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>জেনে রাখো: X, Y, Z অক্ষের দিকে আয়ত একক ভেক্টর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1001.56em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-460"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-461"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-462"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-463"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-469"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-470"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-471"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.21em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">j</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm \hat{i}\ ,\ \hat{j}\ </script></span> ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="width: 0.576em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-476"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-477"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-478"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-479"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৬]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 12 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>বীজগাণিতিক পদ্ধতিতে ভেক্টর যোগের সূত্র কতটি?</p>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৮৩]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 13 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুটি সমান ভেক্টরের মধ্যবর্তী কোণ কত হলে এদের লব্ধি প্রত্যেক ভেক্টরের সমান হবে?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="width: 17.01em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1013.86em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-507"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-508"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-510" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-513" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-514" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-517" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-518" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-521"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-523" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-524" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-525" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-526" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-527" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-535" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-536" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm a^2=a^2+a^2+2a^2cos\theta \Rightarrow cos \theta =\frac{1}{2}-1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>120</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-539" style="width: 11.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1009.18em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-540"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-546"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-547"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-548" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-549" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-550"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-551" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-552"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-553"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-554" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-555"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-556" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-557"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-558" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-559" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-560" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">120</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-563"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-564"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>120</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm \Rightarrow\theta=\cos^{-1}{\left(-\frac{1}{2}\right)}=120°</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>টর্ক, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi>&amp;#x03C4;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-566" style="width: 4.223em; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.055em; left: -0.039em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-580" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-581"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-582"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>τ</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-36">\rm \vec{\tau}=\vec{r}\times\vec{F}</script></span> যা ভেক্টর গুণনের উদাহরণ।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৪]</p>

                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৮]</p>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 16 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="width: 7.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.447em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.977em, 1006.37em, 3.988em, -999.998em); top: -3.24em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-586"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-587"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-588"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-589"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.208em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-595"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-596"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-597"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-598"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.208em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-603"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-604"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.246em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-606" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-608" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.243em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.816em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.275em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-37">\rm \hat{j}\times\left(\hat{j}\times\hat{k}\ \right)=</script></span>&nbsp;কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-610" style="width: 1.642em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.323em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.095em, 1001.32em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-611"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-612" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-613"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-614"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-615"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.549em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.5em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.37em, 3.6em, -999.998em); top: -4.278em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.392em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">\rm-\hat{k}  </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-640" style="width: 15.002em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.559em, 1012.3em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -2.826em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-641"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-642"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-643"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-644"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-646" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-647" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-648" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-649" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-650"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-651"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-652"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-653"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.21em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-654" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">j</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-656" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-657" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-658"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-659"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-661" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-663" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-666"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-667"><span style="display: inline-block;
