width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-671" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-672"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-673"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-678"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-679"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.21em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.084em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">j</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-684"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-685"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-690"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-691"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-692"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.83em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\rm \hat{j}\times\left(\hat{j}\times\hat{k}\ \right)=\hat{j}\times\hat{i}\therefore\hat{j}\times\hat{i}=-\hat{k} </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 17 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>দুটি ভেক্টর যখন একই সরলরেখা বরাবর বিপরীত দিকে ক্রিয়া করে তখন তাদের লব্ধির মান-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.137em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>∼</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>∼</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\rm R_{min}=\sqrt{P^2+Q^2-2PQ}=\sqrt{\left(P\sim Q\right)^2}=P \sim Q </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৬]</p>
</span>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 19 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="width: 1.194em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm 5\hat{i}</script></span> ভেক্টরটির বিপ্রতীপ ভেক্টর নিচের কোনটি?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-742" style="width: 2.188em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 20 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-806" style="width: 4.324em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.541em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.12em, 1003.47em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-807"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-808"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-809"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-810"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.259em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-845" style="width: 3.568em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.912em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1002.87em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-846"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-847"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-848"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-849"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.166em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-854"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-855"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-856"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.125em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-858" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">\rm \vec{A}=-\vec{B}</script></span> হলে ভেক্টরদ্বয় সমান্তরাল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-859" style="width: 5.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1004.43em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-860"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-861" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-863"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-864"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-865" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.166em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-867" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-868" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-869"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-870"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.125em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\rm \therefore\vec{A}\times\vec{B}=0</script></span>&nbsp;<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১২৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 21 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-961" style="width: 15.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1012.75em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-962"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-963"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-964"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-965"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.166em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-967" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-969" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-970"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-971"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-972" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.125em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-979" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-980" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-982" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-983" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-984" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-985"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-986" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-987" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-988" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-989" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-990" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-992" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\rm \vec{A}.\vec{B}=9\times4-1\times6+\left(-6\right)\times5=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-993" style="width: 6.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.453em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.41em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-994"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-995" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-996" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1001" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1002" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">\rm \Rightarrow AB\ cos\theta=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1005" style="width: 4.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.059em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.02em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1006"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1007" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">\rm \Rightarrow cos\theta=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1014" style="width: 4.305em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.395em, 1003.36em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1015"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1016" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">90</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1020"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1021"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>90</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\rm \therefore\theta=90°</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৫]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[তপন স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১]</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 23 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>সরণ ভেক্টরকে কি দ্বারা সূচিত করা হয়?</p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="width: 0.64em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1030" style="width: 0.503em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.412em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.277em, 1000.37em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1031"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1032"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1033"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1034"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.412em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.418em, 1000.37em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.051em; left: -0.043em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.458em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.271em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭০]&nbsp;</p>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 24 </span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>আয়ত একক ভেক্টর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1084" style="width: 2.666em; [ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 25 </span>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1165" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.23em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1166"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm -2</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1169" style="width: 19.264em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1225" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1226"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1227"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1228"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1231" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.83em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-83">\rm \vec{A}.\vec{B}=\left(2\hat{i}+2\hat{j}-2\hat{k}\right).\left(m\hat{i}+3\hat{j}+4\hat{k}\right)=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="width: 18.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.961em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.436em, 1014.88em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1235"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1236" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1241" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\rm \Rightarrow2m+6-8=0\Rightarrow2m-2=0\therefore m =1</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৪]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 26 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="width: 9.465em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.751em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.126em, 1007.64em, 3.877em, -999.998em); top: -3.24em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1257"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1258"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="vertical-align: 1.008em;"><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>|</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1329" style="width: 7.748em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.682em, 1006.23em, 3.486em, -999.998em); top: -2.826em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1330"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1331"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="vertical-align: 1.027em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1364" style="width: 16.846em; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\rm \Rightarrow A^2+2\vec{A}.\vec{B}+B^2=A^2-2\vec{A}.\vec{B}+B^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1408" style="width: 5.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.55em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1409"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1416" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">\rm 4ABcos\theta=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1419" style="width: 3.65em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.95em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1420"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1421" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1422" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1424" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1426" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-95">\rm cos\theta=0 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="width: 3.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.58em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1428"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1429" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">90</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1432"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1433"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>90</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">\rm\theta=90°</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1436"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1437" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-97">\rm \therefore</script></span>&nbsp;A ও B পরস্পর লম্ব।</p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-১০০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 27 </span>

</label>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1560" style="width: 6.273em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.125em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1005.12em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1561"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1562"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1563"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1564"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1565" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.055em; left: 0.043em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1566" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1567" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1569" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1570"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1571"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.043em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1575" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1576" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">b</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1577" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1581" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi>θ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\rm \vec{a}\ .\vec{b}=ab\ cos\theta</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1582" style="width: 1.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1001.19em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1583"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1584" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1585" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1586"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1587"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.055em; left: 0.043em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.453em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.203em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.103em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-105">\rm \therefore\vec{a}</script></span>&nbsp;ভেক্টরের উপর <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1590" style="width: 0.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1000.45em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1591"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1592"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1593"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1594"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1623"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1624"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-1625"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1629"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1630"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1631" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.23em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;
