top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2290"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2291"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.323em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.46em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2292"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.6em, 1000.5em, 3.918em, -999.998em); top: -4.551em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.053em, 1000.87em, 4.328em, -999.998em); top: -4.051em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-161">\rm \sqrt3 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>1</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-162-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2294" style="width: 1.551em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.277em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.19em, 2.416em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2295"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.164em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-162">\rm -1 </script></span></p>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

<p>অবস্থান বা ব্যাসার্ধ ভেক্টরের মান&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-164-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2336" style="width: 8.322em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.398em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-164">\rm R=\sqrt{x^2+y^2+z^2}</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৬৯]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.37em, 3.6em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi>η</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-167">\rm \vec{A}\times\vec{B}=ABsin\theta\hat{\eta}\  </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>.</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2424" style="width: 7.835em;                                             </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৭]</p>

width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-171">\rm \vec{C}=\vec{A}\times\vec{B}</script></span> হয় তাহলে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-172-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2484" style="width: 0.859em;                                         </div>

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ডানহাতি স্ক্রু নিয়মে A ও B উভয়ের উপর লম্বভাবে C কাজ করবে।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৭]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 45 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-179-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2533" style="width: 0.598em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.157em, 1000.37em, 2.312em, -999.998em); top: -2.196em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2534"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2535"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2536"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-2537"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.26em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.114em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.208em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.2em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.23em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-179">\rm \hat{i} </script></span>&nbsp;এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-180-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2540" style="width: 1.567em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.269em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.194em, 1001.16em, 2.424em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2541"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2543"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2544"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-2545"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.26em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.114em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2546" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.169em, 1000.37em, 3.579em, -999.998em); top: -4.208em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.134em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-180">\rm- \hat{i} </script></span> ভেক্টরদ্বয়ের মধ্যকার কোণ কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>এখানে, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-185-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2573" style="width: 2.42em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1001.97em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2574"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2575"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2576"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-2577"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-185">\rm \hat{i}=x  </script></span> &nbsp;অক্ষ বরাবর; <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-186-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2582" style="width: 3.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.24em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1003.24em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2583"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2585"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2586"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-2587"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.125em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-186">\rm -\hat{i}=-x</script></span>&nbsp;অক্ষ বরাবর</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-187-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2593" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1000.49em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2594"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2595" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.215em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-187">\rm \therefore</script></span>&nbsp;কোণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-188-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2596" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.34em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2597"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2599" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">180</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2600"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2601"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-188">\rm = 180°</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭১]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 46 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন ভেক্টর গুণনটি সত্য?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-189-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2603" style="width: 8.245em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.324em; left: 0.184em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.458em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.271em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.275em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.614em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-192">\rm \vec{P}+\vec{Q}=\vec{P}-\vec{Q} </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ভেক্টর গুণনের নিয়মানুসারে,</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-193-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>Q</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2683" style="width: 8.977em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-194-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2714" style="width: 13.199em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2758" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-195-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2761" style="width: 11.232em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.182em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1009.1em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.006em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2762"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2763"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2765"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2770" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2874"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2875"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-2876"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2880" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2881"><span class="munderover" id="MathJax-Span-2882"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.37em, 3.609em, -999.998em); top: -4.26em; left: 0.002em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">^</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.01em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>×</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-197">\rm \left(v\right)\ \hat{k}\times\hat{i}=\hat{j}=-(\hat{i}\times\hat{k}) </script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৮]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-201-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo></mover></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2956" style="width: 9.383em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৯৮]</p>

                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 48 </span>

                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.157em, 1006.97em, 2.573em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.246em; left: 0.151em;"><span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0.486em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⃗&nbsp;<span style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; margin-left: -0.259em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0em;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                         </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-208-Frame" tabindex="0" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>j</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mover><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x005E;</mo></mover></mrow></math>" role="presentation" style="position: relative;"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3126" style="width: 5.512em; style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo stretchy="false">→</mo></mover></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">j</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mover><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo stretchy="false">^</mo></mover></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-209">\rm \vec{A}+\vec{B}=2\hat{i}+4\hat{j}-5\hat{k}+\hat{i}+2\hat{j}+3\hat{k}=3\hat{i}+6\hat{j}-2\hat{k}</script></span></p>

<p>[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭০]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 49 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি সামান্তরিকের সন্নিহিত দুটি বাহু যদি দুটি ভেক্টর দ্বারা নির্দেশিত হয় তবে ক্ষেত্রফল-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ভেক্টর দুটির স্কেলার গুণফলের সমান</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ভেক্টর দুটির যোগফলের সমান</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ভেক্টর দুটির ভেক্টর গুণফলের মানের সমান</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>ভেক্টর দুটির বিয়োগফলের সমান</p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সামান্তরিকের ক্ষেত্রফল দুটি ভেক্টরের ক্রস গুণফলের মানের সমান।<br>
[ইসহাক স্যার: সংস্করণ-২০২২, পৃষ্ঠা-৭৩]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial">
                                            <span>Question 50 </span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>স্ফেরোমিটারের বৃত্তাকার স্কেলের মোট ভাগ সংখ্যা 50। স্কেলটিকে এক পাক ঘুরালে রৈখিক স্কেলে সরণ হয় 0.5 mm। লঘিষ্ঠ গণন কত?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
